ED_Title: Appointment of the members of the Credentials Committee
ED_DecisionText: At its 1st plenary meeting, on 15 September 2020 the General Assembly, in accordance with rule 28 of its rules of procedure, appointed a Credentials Committee for its seventy-fifth session consisting of the following Member States: CAMEROON, CHINA, ICELAND, PAPUA NEW GUINEA, RUSSIAN FEDERATION, TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO, UNITED REPUBLIC OF TANZANIA, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA and URUGUAY.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
